inclusion.criterion: Mild to moderate aortic stenosis defined by peak velocity of aortic jet between 2.0 and 3.5 m/sec
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Untreated hypertension: systolic BP ≥ 140 or diastolic BP ≥ 90 mmHg
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients received no beta-blocker therapy for more than 12 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Symtomatic aortic stenosis: presence of exertional dyspnea, angina or syncope
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Planned cardiac surgery (e.g., CABG, valve repair or replacement, or aneurysmectomy) or planned major non-cardiac surgery within the study period
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function and EF of 25%. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
